function removeDuplicatedParagraphs(text, chapterTitle) {

    for (var i = 0; i < 2; i++) {  // åªå¤„ç†å‰ä¸¤æ®µ
        var paragraph = paragraphs[i];

        var lastChar = paragraph.charAt(paragraph.length - 1);

}
